data.enText: given to a child by its parents before it is born

data.chText: 癫痫是她家族的遗传病。
data.enText: Epilepsy is hereditary in her family.
that is legally given to sb's child, when that person dies

data.chText: 世袭的头衔 / 君主制

data.enText: holding a rank or title that is hereditary

data.chText: 世袭的贵族 / 统治者

simple_means.memory_skill: heredit〔= hered〕继承 + ary …的 → 世袭的，遗传的

tr: inherited or inheritable by established rules (usually legal rules) of descent
occurring among members of a family usually by heredity

value.def: A hereditary characteristic or illness is passed on to a child from its parents before it is born.

example.ex: Cystic fibrosis is the commonest fatal hereditary disease...
example.tran: 囊性纤维化是最常见的致命遗传疾病。

example.ex: In men, hair loss is hereditary.

value.def: A title or position in society that is hereditary is one that is passed on as a right from parent to child.

example.ex: ...the position of the head of state is hereditary...
British Prime Ministers are traditionally offered hereditary peerages.
example.tran: 英国首相传统上会被授予可世袭的贵族爵位。

partsOfSpeech.dec: heir 继承 + ess 表女性 → 女继承人
heir 继承 + ship 表资格 → 继承权
heredit〔= hered〕继承 + able 可…的 → 可继承的，可遗传的
heredit〔= hered〕继承 + ary …的 → 世袭的，遗传的
